dct_title_s: Vilayet de Sivas:  : divisé en 4 sandjaks et 26 cazas et 255 Nahiés / par Vital Cuinet ; éditieur Ernest Leroux.
dct_description_sm: Map shows administrative boundaries (vilayet, sandjaks, cazas); railroads in construction, paths, three classes of roads; salt mines, and forests. Vilayet de Sivas was a first level adminisrative division vilayet  [province] of the Ottoman Empire. Covers four Sandjaks [departments]: 1. Sivas  -- 2. Tokat -- 3. d'Amassia-- 4. Kara-Hissar-Charki. Principal meridian is Paris. Original map is filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, a map reproduction is attached to companion volume.
